metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5303 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Horde Text Filter API in Horde Groupware and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.2.16 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted data:text/html content in a form (1) action or (2) xlink attribute.

criterions.comment: php-horde-text-filter package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
